body:
Hello!
I have reached 20,000 thousand kills and achieved a K/D ratio of over 5.0! :D
I'm very attentive and careful with my stats I guess, so it's a big deal for me.
http://gyazo.com/bf30e59a65ba940881c893f554c9816e

title: Reaching New Personal Goals

replies.body: How come we are about the same at pvp yet you have a 5 kd :p. my goals 40,000 kills and a 3 kd
replies.body_tagged: How come we are about the same at pvp yet you have a 5 kd :p. my goals 40,000 kills and a 3 kd

replies.body:
I have a different playstyle than you. I'm either defense/mid-field, so I'm more cautious with my approach. I get less deaths but at a cost, less kills. However, I don't die as much :P

But yes, I agree we are around the same at PVP ;)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Congrats, Cina! Nice to know someone else cares about stats a little bit. :D
replies.body_tagged: Congrats, Cina! Nice to know someone else cares about stats a little bit. :D

replies.body:
Nice job! :D
You're freakin amazing at Minecraft PVP..
I just do it for fun, though, so I don't care about my KD x3
Even if I did, I could get nowhere close to yours. Awesome! :D
